from event_manager import *
from mqtt import *
from machine import Pin, SoftI2C
from aiot_dht20 import DHT20
from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from aiot_lcd1602 import LCD1602
import music
import time
from machine import RTC
from wifi import __wifi__
import ntptime

event_manager.reset()

aiot_dht20 = DHT20(SoftI2C(scl=Pin(22), sda=Pin(21)))

def on_event_timer_callback_K_y_k_b_m():
  global den, nguoi, quat, Flag, temp_web, Auto, temp_hot, Temp_max
  mqtt.publish('cambien1', (aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()))
  mqtt.publish('cambien2', (round(translate((pin2.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))))
  mqtt.publish('cambien3', (aiot_dht20.dht20_humidity()))

event_manager.add_timer_event(20000, on_event_timer_callback_K_y_k_b_m)

aiot_lcd1602 = LCD1602()

def sound_alarm():
  for count in range(5):
    music.play(['A5:1'], wait=True)
    music.play(['E5:1'], wait=True)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def Trigger():
  global den, nguoi, quat, Flag, temp_web, Auto, temp_hot, Temp_max, aiot_lcd1602, aiot_dht20
  if (aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()) > temp_hot and Flag == 0:
    mqtt.publish('button2', '2')
    Flag = -7200
  if (aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()) >= Temp_max:
    aiot_lcd1602.clear()
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(5, 1)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Canh bao chay')
    sound_alarm()
    time.sleep_ms(2000)
  if (pin3.read_digital()==1) and (int(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[4])))) >= 12:
    aiot_lcd1602.clear()
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('CO NGUOI')
    time.sleep_ms(1000)
    mqtt.publish('button1', '1')

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__button1_(den):
  global nguoi, quat, Flag, temp_web, Auto, temp_hot, Temp_max
  if den == '1':
    display.set_all('#ff0000')
    aiot_lcd1602.clear()
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Bat den')
    time.sleep_ms(1000)
  else:
    display.set_all('#000000')
    aiot_lcd1602.clear()
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Tat den')
    time.sleep_ms(1000)

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__button2_(quat):
  global den, nguoi, Flag, temp_web, Auto, temp_hot, Temp_max
  pin10.write_analog(round(translate(((int(quat)) * 33.33), 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  if quat == '0':
    aiot_lcd1602.clear()
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Tat quat')
    time.sleep_ms(1000)
  else:
    aiot_lcd1602.clear()
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Bat quat')
    time.sleep_ms(1000)

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__temphot_(temp_web):
  global den, nguoi, quat, Flag, Auto, temp_hot, Temp_max
  temp_hot = int(temp_web)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def Sever():
  global den, nguoi, quat, Flag, temp_web, Auto, temp_hot, Temp_max, aiot_lcd1602, aiot_dht20
  mqtt.on_receive_message('button1', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__button1_)
  mqtt.on_receive_message('button2', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__button2_)
  mqtt.on_receive_message('temphot', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__temphot_)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def Auto2():
  global den, nguoi, quat, Flag, temp_web, Auto, temp_hot, Temp_max, aiot_lcd1602, aiot_dht20
  if (int(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[4])))) == 7 or (int(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[4])))) == 18:
    display.set_all('#ff0000')
    mqtt.publish('button2', 1)
  if (int(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[4])))) == 10 or (int(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[4])))) == 23:
    display.set_all('#000000')
    mqtt.publish('button2', 0)

def on_button_a_pressed():
  global den, nguoi, quat, Flag, temp_web, Auto, temp_hot, Temp_max
  aiot_lcd1602.clear()
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Temp:')
  temp_hot = (temp_hot if isinstance(temp_hot, (int, float)) else 0) + 1
  if temp_hot >= 46:
    temp_hot = 25
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(6, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(temp_hot)
  mqtt.publish('temphot', temp_hot)
  time.sleep_ms(1000)

button_a.on_pressed = on_button_a_pressed

def on_button_b_pressed():
  global den, nguoi, quat, Flag, temp_web, Auto, temp_hot, Temp_max
  aiot_lcd1602.clear()
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Temp:')
  temp_hot = (temp_hot if isinstance(temp_hot, (int, float)) else 0) + -1
  if temp_hot <= 15:
    temp_hot = 25
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(6, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(temp_hot)
  mqtt.publish('temphot', temp_hot)
  time.sleep_ms(1000)

button_b.on_pressed = on_button_b_pressed

def on_button_a_b_pressed():
  global den, nguoi, quat, Flag, temp_web, Auto, temp_hot, Temp_max
  aiot_lcd1602.clear()
  if Auto == 0:
    Auto = (Auto if isinstance(Auto, (int, float)) else 0) + 1
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Auto on')
  else:
    Auto = 0
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Auto off')
  time.sleep_ms(1000)

button_a.on_pressed_ab = on_button_a_b_pressed; button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1;
